channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Agent

item.title: CVE-2023-41745|2024-09-27T14:16:25.438Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Sensitive information disclosure due to excessive collection of system information. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 30991, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 35979.

item.title: CVE-2023-41742|2024-09-27T14:17:36.928Z -- acronis -- acronis%20agent
item.description: Excessive attack surface due to binding to an unrestricted IP address. The following products are affected: Acronis Agent (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 30430, Acronis Cyber Protect 15 (Linux, macOS, Windows) before build 35979.
